ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_01_10:
This and that...
Oh, and that, too...
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_02_10:
Preparation is key
before an adventure.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_03_10:
Be diligent!
Every ranger knows that!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_01_10:
I’m a Pokémon Ranger!
I’ll protect the peace of Pasio!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_02_10:
You’re going on an adventure, too, huh?
Then you must prepare!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_03_10:
Even when your Pokémon are dependable,
you can’t just count on them.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_04_10:
Call me as soon as you’re in danger!
I’ll come rescue you!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_01_10:
Giving up when you know that the adventure is
too arduous is also important.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_02_10:
Only Pokémon Rangers never give up—
even when the situation seems impossible!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_03_10:
It’s because if I give up, it means that
I’m giving up on somebody else.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_01_10:
Grass-type moves are
gentle on the skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_02_10:
Nature means grass,
and grass means beauty!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_03_10:
Being one with nature
means silky smooth skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_01_10: My Bayleef’s aromatherapy is truly excellent!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_02_10:
Apparently, the spicy aroma emitted
from the buds makes the skin smooth and supple.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_03_10:
That’s why Pokémon Rangers are
young and beautiful!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_01_10:
Bayleef is such a good Pokémon.
She thrives on praise!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_02_10:
But if I praise her too much, she sometimes
gets bashful and uses Tackle on me.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_01_10:
I swiftly come to the
rescue of those in need.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_03_10:
Even in deep forests, be
sure not to miss anything!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_01_10:
I have great eyesight!
I can see faraway objects even in the forest.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_02_10:
My good vision comes in handy in battles, too!
I can aim well and hit the target with moves.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_03_10:
But moves that are difficult sometimes
tend to be more powerful.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_04_10:
To fight with certitude, or to aim for a
single blow—that is the question...
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_01_10:
Oftentimes, powerful moves tend to miss the
target when it’s a critical moment.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_02_10:
But Pokémon are the ones using the moves,
so perhaps my vision doesn’t matter so much?
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_01_10: It’s great to live in nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_03_10:
I hope to be one when I
grow up.
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_02_10:
It’s adorable that you
admire me!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_03_10: I have to teach you a lot!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_01_10:
What’s needed in a Pokémon Ranger
is a strong sense of justice!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_02_10:
And respect for and understanding of nature
and Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_04_10:
Camping is especially great since
you get to directly experience nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_05_10:
Learning from a camper about proper
clothing and gear is also useful!
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_06_10: If so, will I no longer be called a “lass”...?
ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_07_10:
An identity crisis!
Could this be a challenge I have to overcome
in order to become a Pokémon Ranger?!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0101_01_10: Will you be able to face the majesty of nature?
ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0501_01_10: I believe that you can face it!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_01_10: Your Pokémon have such genuine eyes!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_02_10:
You can overcome anything
when you’re with your Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_03_10:
That kind of relationship is very important.
You have a good match!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0101_01_10:
It’s the law of the jungle that prevails in nature!
I’ll take a bite out of you!
ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0601_01_10:
The law of the jungle is real. You have to be
creative if you want to beat stronger opponents.
